Package com.amplifyframework.api.graphql

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphQLBehavior
    GraphQL behaviors include varying approaches to perform the query, subscribe and mutate GraphQL operations.
    GraphQLRequest.VariablesSerializer
    An interface defining the method used to serialize a map of variables to go with a request.
    GraphQLResponse.Factory
    A factory which generates a strongly-typed response object from a string that was returned from a GraphQL API.
    Operation
    Represents a GraphQL operation type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GraphQLLocation
    Location mapping to a particular line and column in the request.
    GraphQLOperation<R>
    A GraphQLOperation is an API operation which returns a GraphQLResponse.
    GraphQLPathSegment
    If a GraphQLResponse contains an error that can be associated with a particular field in the requested GraphQL document, it will contain an entry with the key, path.
    GraphQLRequest<R>
    A request against a GraphQL endpoint.
    GraphQLResponse<R>
    Wrapper for GraphQL response containing both response data and error information.
    GraphQLResponse.Error
    Error object that models GraphQL error.
    GsonResponseAdapters
    A collection of Gson type adapters to facilitate deserialization of an GraphQL JSON response.
    GsonResponseAdapters.ErrorDeserializer
    Deserializes an error in a GraphQL response JSON into a modeled GraphQLResponse.Error.
    GsonResponseAdapters.ResponseDeserializer
    Deserializes GraphQL response JSON into modeled GraphQLResponses.
    PaginatedResult<T>
    Represents a page of results returned from an API.
    SimpleGraphQLRequest<R>
    A basic implementation of GraphQLRequest, which takes a document String, and variables Map.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MutationType
    Enum of GraphQL operation types.
    OperationType
    Represents a GraphQL operation.
    QueryType
    Enum of GraphQL operation types.
    SubscriptionType
    Enum of GraphQL operation types.
